# The `is_array` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A type trait whose <code>value</code> field is <code>true</code> if the given type is a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bcarray">BCArray</a> (of any element kind). <a href="#details">More...</a>
